mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM member WHERE store_id=#{storeId, jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT
FROM member WHERE phone=#{phone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(store_id,member_level_id,phone,name,sex,birthday,join_date,valid_date,nail_money,beauty_money,remark) VALUES (#{storeId, jdbcType=BIGINT},#{memberLevelId, jdbcType=BIGINT},#{phone, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sex, jdbcType=TINYINT},#{birthday, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{joinDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{validDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{nailMoney, jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{beautyMoney, jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
UPDATE member
level_id=#{levelId, jdbcType=BIGINT},
phone=#{phone, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name=#{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex=#{sex, jdbcType=TINYINT},
birthday=#{birthday, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
join_date=#{joinDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
valid_date=#{validDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
nail_money=#{nailMoney, jdbcType=DECIMAL},
beauty_money=#{beautyMoney, jdbcType=DECIMAL},
remark=#{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
WHERE id=#{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM member WHERE id=#{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}

DELETE FROM member WHERE id IN
#{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}
